title: Land, Sea, and Air
desc:
Post 2294
- Combine the forces of these 3 elements to perform 3 of the following sequentially (you may choose an option more than once):
 - Cause an earthquake. All other players draw a card. If performed 3 times, you will draw 2 random **Phantom** <:brown:1107516362903007232> cards of your choice (that are tournament legal).
 - Quench your thirst. Any cards that are <:blue:1106234079055200378>, <:cyan:1106716163184009277>, üåä, ‚ùÑÔ∏è, <:brown:1107516362903007232>, <:lightblue:1120572625865949194>, <:white:1107514189574045726>, or <:wild:1106237191388143838> in your hand are played on top of this card, regardless of color coordination. If performed 3 times, draw 3 üåä cards (that are tournament legal).
 - Form a tornado. The cards in everyone's hands are shuffled around, but number of cards held remains constant. If performed 3 times, you get to see 5 random cards in others' hands and choose whether or not to include them in your hand. __This does not affect **Phantom**, **Ethereal**, **Flip**ped, **Hidden**, or **Enhance**d__ cards.
